name: Little Girls Friend
description:
Game by: kussa1999

Story by: DhampirByte

Icon art by: Poop00

Soundeffects from: https://mixkit.co/ and: https://www.mediafire.com/file/qj41dau31b32yk7/Creepy_whispers.zip/file 

All other assets created by Lukas

Description:

This is a pixelated horror game inspired by slender, but in this game the monster is invisible, so you have rely on sound to survive...
